keywords.indexterm: Supported file storage services and CMS

body.p:
By default, the comes bundled with some plugins that allows you to integrate with the following file storage services:
Git
WebDAV
SharePoint

is also integrated by many of the industry-leading content management service providers. Our CMS partners providing integrations for include Astoria, Componize, DitaExchange, DITAworks, KGU, RSI, Vasont, and IBM FileNet.

link.linktext: Oxygen XML Web Author Home Page
